__e: All right, well, make yourself at home.
Make yourselves at home which in this house means do whatever you like.
I want you to feel at home here because this is your home now, too.

I want you to feel at home here because this is your home now, too.
Is there any reason why somebody would want you two to be the first to know that she was dead?
I didn't know it was you, but I didn't make the call.
I felt certain you would be.
I thought you two were buddies? Isn't that why we're here?
Once and for all, you guys need to understand how much better it would be if the two of you were friends.
Well, I'm very sorry to hear that, but you two weren't close, were you?
You said that if you'd been there,
I just don't know what I would have done if you hadn't been there.
I don't know what would have happened to us if you hadn't been the people that you are.
The police are out looking for him right now.
You're here because I wanted you here, so I could--
You're home but have not arrived.
I didn't know that you and my dad were on Squad together.
And like he said, it shouldn't have taken four of you.
Whatever you two were in the past, that's not what you are now.
